alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lincoln (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:15PM EDT until April 05 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Columbia County in east central Georgia... Southeastern Lincoln County in east central Georgia... Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Central Saluda County in central South Carolina... McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 514 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Ninety Six Historic Site to near Appling, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Grovetown, Evans, Martinez, Edgefield, Saluda, McCormick, Harlem, Johnston, Appling, Clarks Hill Recreation Area, Edgefield County Airport, Elijah Clark State Park, Riverwood, Mistletoe State Park, Hamilton Branch State Park, Saluda County Airport, J. Strom Thurmond Dam, Mccormick County Airport and Trenton. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 179 and 194. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina.
